articles.author: Edward Wong, Megan Specia
articles.title: U.S. Says It Won’t Discuss Withdrawing Troops from Iraq, as Iraq’s Leader Requested - The New York Times
articles.description: U.S. Says It Won’t Discuss Withdrawing Troops from Iraq, as Iraq’s Leader Requested The New York Times Iraqi PM tells US to start working on troop withdrawal CNBC Iraqi government asks US to set mechanisms for 'safe withdrawal of troops from Iraq' CNN Iraq as…
articles.content:
The summary of the call did not mention the request for a delegation to discuss troop withdrawal.
United States forces have been stationed in Iraq, and to a much lesser degree in eastern Syria, as part of that operation. President George W. Bush ordered an i… [+1984 chars]
